snippet.title: Green Hill Paradise - Act 2: Final Mix Trailer
snippet.description:
Hello, folks! Danny here! I just wanted to thank you all so much for your support and feedback regarding the GHP project. With your feedback and Let's Plays, I've been able to fix numerous glitches and tweak a few things to make this updated version of the game even better than it was at initial launch.

GHP - Act 2: Final Mix is arriving just in time for the Sonic Amateur Games Expo: http://www.sonicfangameshq.com/SAGE/ 

As such, please support the event and visit GHP's Booth. The download will be provided there and EXCLUSIVELY there until the event has concluded, so go give them some love!

Again, thank you all so much for your support! I hope you all enjoy Green Hill Paradise - Act 2: Final Mix! 

Song:
Hedgehog Lullaby by TrickyWolfy
